Package dev.vernite.vernite.task.comment

Class Comment

java.lang.Object
dev.vernite.vernite.task.comment.Comment
@Entity public class Comment extends Object
Entity for representing comment for task.

  • Constructor Details

    • Comment

      public Comment(Task task, String content, User user)
      Creates comment with given content and author. Sets creation date to current time.
      Parameters:
      task - task to which comment is connected
      content - content of comment
      user - author of comment

    • Comment

      public Comment(Task task, User user, CreateComment create)
      Creates comment with given content and author. Sets creation date to current time. Gets content from create request.
      Parameters:
      task - task to which comment is connected
      user - author of comment
      create - create request

  • Method Details

    • update

      public void update(UpdateComment update)
      Updates comment entity with data from update.
      Parameters:
      update - must not be null and be valid

    • setContent

      public void setContent(String content)
      Sets content of comment. Trims content before setting it.
      Parameters:
      content - content of comment
